subject: Re: [junit] testing log4j output
msgSnippet: ... StringWriter logged = new StringWriter(); Logger log = Logger.getLogger( ... ); log.setLevel(Level.ALL); log.setAdditivity(false); log.addAppender(new
messageBody:
On Tuesday 07 June 2005 18:10, pieters_eric wrote:
> Any recomendations on capturing and asserting log4j output?

StringWriter logged = new StringWriter();
Logger log = Logger.getLogger("...");
log.setLevel(Level.ALL);
log.setAdditivity(false);
log.addAppender(new WriterAppender(new SimpleLayout(), logged));
// do something log-worthy
assertEquals("Wrong log message", "whatever", logged.toString());

Robert
